title.rendered: “New AI tool offers subtitling and dubbing alternative”

excerpt.rendered: A London-based tech startup, called Flawless, is introducing an alternative to more traditional dubbing and subtitling processes, using AI as part of a system designed to create lip-synced versions of movies and other content in multiple languages.
